span.span: Converts a to a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于将数据转换来回和字符串类型。The class is used to convert data to and from and string types. > [!CAUTION] > 永远不应直接访问的类型转换器。You should never access a type converter directly. 相反，通过调用适当的转换器。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using . 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例基类。For more information, see the examples in the base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来确定是否实例从中调用此方法的类支持可以从使用指定的格式上下文的列表中选取的值的标准集。Use the method to determine whether the instance of the class that this method is called from supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list, using the specified format context. 重写此方法始终返回`true`以指示此类支持可以从列表中选取的值的标准集。This method is overridden to always return `true` to indicate that this class supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.
